Rapat Kerjasama Menag, Komisi VIII Akan Bahas Isu Cadar
07 Nov 2019, 11:46 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Rapat Kerjasama Menag, Komisi VIII Akan Bahas Isu Cadar

KBRN, Jakarta : Wakil Ketua Komisi VIII Marwan Dasopang mengatakan bahwa akan membahas isu aktual dengan Menteri Agama (Menag)Â Fachrul Razi. Salah satunya, isu cadar dan celana cingkrang di institusi pemerintahan."Itu nanti pasti muncul, itu kaitan dengan isu aktual. Pernyataan menteri itu bisa menjadi sikap bagi masyarakat terlalu ceroboh untuk dinyatakan sebagai radikal berdasarkan penampilan saja, terlalu mengeneralisasi, tampilan celana cingkrang, cadar," jelasnya RRI, Kamis (7/11/2019).Ia menyebut bahwa hari ini akan ada agenda rapat kerjasama bersama Menag sekaligus bersilaturahmi. Selain membahas isu celana cingkrang dan cadar akan membahas program kedepannya terkait dengan keagamaan."Ya kita mengangendakan rapat kerja sama bersama menteri dalam rangka evaluasi program 2019 dan minta penjelasan program 2020 sekaligus membahas isu aktual itu hari ini," imbuhnya."Lain kita berbicara hal-hal yang fundamental tugas-tugas dari Kemenag yaitu dia akan menangani persoalan pendidikan agama kemudian urusan haji urusan industri halal, kemudian nilai moral keagamaan," katanya.Ia mengatakan komisi VIII dalam persiapan raker sudah mendengar pendapat dari berbagai pihak termasuk masyarakat. Sebagian masyarakat kontra terhadap isu pelarangan cadar dan celana cingkrang di instansi pemerintahan."Kita mendengarkan pendapat sebagian mengatakan pendekatan menteri seperti itu kurang pas bahkan ada yang menolak dengan pendekatan itu tentu akan muncul nanti di raker, akan dibahas," tutupnya.

Minister of Religion Cooperation Meeting, Commission VIII Will Discuss Veil Issues
Nov 7 2019, 11:46 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Minister of Religion Cooperation Meeting, Commission VIII Will Discuss Veil Issues

KBRN, Jakarta: Deputy Chairman of Commission VIII Marwan Dasopang said that he would discuss the actual issue with the Minister of Religion (Menag) Fachrul Razi. One of them, the issue of the veil and pants in government institutions. "That will certainly emerge, it is related to the actual issue. The minister's statement can be an attitude for the public to be too careless to be expressed as radical based on appearance alone, too generalizing, the appearance of the pants, the veil , "he explained RRI, Thursday (11/07/2019). He said that today there would be an agenda for a joint cooperation meeting with the Minister of Religion as well as a friendly visit. In addition to discussing the issue of trousers and veils, we will discuss future programs related to religion. "Yes, we are holding a joint meeting with the minister for the evaluation of the 2019 program and asking for an explanation of the 2020 program while discussing the actual issue today," he added. "the fundamental tasks of the Ministry of Religion are that he will deal with religious education issues, then the pilgrimage affairs of the halal industry, then religious moral values," he said. He said commission VIII in working meeting had heard the opinions of various parties including the public. Some people are counter to the issue of the prohibition of veils and trousers in government agencies. "We hear the opinion of some saying that the minister's approach is not appropriate even there are those who refuse to approach it will certainly appear later in the meeting, will be discussed," he concluded.
